title: A Machine Learning-oriented Survey on Tiny Machine Learning. (arXiv:2309.11932v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: The emergence of Tiny Machine Learning (TinyML) has positively revolutionized the field of Artificial Intelligence by promoting the joint design of resource-constrained IoT hardware devices and their learning-based software architectures. TinyML carries an essential role within the fourth and fifth industrial revolutions in helping societies, economies, and individuals employ effective AI-infused computing technologies (e.g., smart cities, automotive, and medical robotics). Given its multidisciplinary nature, the field of TinyML has been approached from many different angles: this comprehensive survey wishes to provide an up-to-date overview focused on all the learning algorithms within TinyML-based solutions. The survey is based on the Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses (PRISMA) methodological flow, allowing for a systematic and complete literature survey. In particular, firstly we will examine the three different workflows for implementing a TinyML-bas

Title: A Machine Learning-oriented Survey on Tiny Machine Learning. (arXiv:2309.11932v1 [cs.LG])
Abstract: The emergence of Tiny Machine Learning (TinyML) has positively revolutionized the field of Artificial Intelligence by promoting the joint design of resource-constrained IoT hardware devices and their learning-based software architectures. TinyML carries an essential role within the fourth and fifth industrial revolutions in helping societies, economies, and individuals employ effective AI-infused computing technologies (e.g., smart cities, automotive, and medical robotics). Given its multidisciplinary nature, the field of TinyML has been approached from many different angles: this comprehensive survey wishes to provide an up-to-date overview focused on all the learning algorithms within TinyML-based solutions. The survey is based on the Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses (PRISMA) methodological flow, allowing for a systematic and complete literature survey. translated_title: 基于机器学习的微型机器学习综述
translated_abstract: 微型机器学习（TinyML）的出现通过推动资源受限的物联网硬件设备与基于学习的软件架构的联合设计，积极革命了人工智能领域。TinyML在第四和第五次工业革命中发挥着重要作用，帮助社会、经济和个人应用有效的人工智能融入计算技术（如智慧城市、汽车和医疗机器人）。由于其多学科性质，TinyML领域已经从许多不同的角度进行了研究：本综述希望提供一个最新的综述，重点关注在基于TinyML的解决方案中的所有学习算法。本综述基于系统综述和元分析的首选报告项（PRISMA）方法流程，实现了系统和完整的文献综述。具体而言，首先我们将研究实现TinyML基础解决方案的三种不同工作流程。
tldr: 本综述旨在提供关于微型机器学习（TinyML）的学习算法的最新综述，重点关注其在人工智能领域的应用与潜在贡献。
en_tdlr: This survey aims to provide an up-to-date overview of the learning algorithms within TinyML, focusing on their applications and potential contributions in the field of Artificial Intelligence.
